name: Providing Residents with Cell Phone Coverage
requirements: Each unit on the map represents 1 mile
Residents prefer cell towers be built at least 1 mile away from their neighborhood.
overview:
Government officials are determining how many cell towers are needed to provide coverage to as many residents as possible. Houses within 4 miles of each cell tower can receive cell coverage. How many cell towers should they build and where? 

Details:

  1. Each unit on the map represents 1 mile.
  2. Residents prefer cell towers be built at least 1 mile away from their house.

FIRST_PROPOSAL.instructions: Thanks for sharing your initial thoughts! As a next step, review some of the skills that might help you improve on your initial proposal. When you're ready, submit your first proposal. Don't worry about getting it perfect. You'll have the chance to modify it!

MODIFY_PROPOSAL.instructions: Your peers and members of the community have also submitted proposals. Help review them to see whether they're on the right track. They might also give you ideas for how to improve your own proposal.
